scene_description_enriched: In an interior setting with a tiled floor and grey walls, Christ, seated and wearing a blue robe, is being crowned with thorns by three tormentors. One figure in a green tunic and striped leggings, wearing a white helmet, presses down on Christ's head with a stick. Another figure in a green tunic and yellow apron, wearing a blue cap, also applies pressure to Christ's head with a stick. A third figure in a blue tunic and pink leggings, holding a stick, appears to be taunting or striking Christ. The scene depicts the moment of the Crowning with Thorns, a significant event in the Passion of Christ.
